title: 820 3332 emc 2512 bios dump
message: So i got one of these wIth catalina beta corrupt bios :). i need a clean dump for this. but i dont find it. just in case ive tried my luck already at the forum, ghostlyhacks.com and many other sites...can someones share a good now working one?. all the ones i seem to find either the machine doesnt boot, or becomes slow after a while, heck the last one didnt saw the ssd :/

title: 820 3332 emc 2512 bios dump
message:
"the last one didnt saw the ssd"
Doesn't have APFS support I suppose.
Take an empty SSD/HDD and install OSX, like High Sierra, or newer.
This will automatically update BIOS; if you do it on internal disk, of course.

title: 820 3332 emc 2512 bios dump
message: well that isnt the issue. since i formatted the ssd and put sierra in there...i even tested with a ssd with maverick and it doesnt work. so it has to be the efi dump!. since before it saw the same drive. i formated the client ssdwith sierra. so can you share a good know one?

title: 820 3332 emc 2512 bios dump
message:
first one, fucked ME region, slow as fuck, and sometimes doesnt boot.

second one its from a 2013 one, meaning EMC 2673, slow as fuck too!.

just in case i used ASD to test sensors and everything looks fine...i called customer too, and he said that machine worked fine before catalina update, it wasnt slow. so if he isnt lying i guess i have to try some more dumps...

title: 820 3332 emc 2512 bios dump
message: Welllll. i figured this shit out :D. after testing with more than 20 dumps, i put HWmonitor and noticed that the left fin stack was at 70C. even thought ASD said sensors were fine...so i checked the board and noticed that U5860 was heating up, replaced and everything is working fine now. and i owe you a apology, the Dumps you shared are good, but with a dirty ME. well we can mark this as solved.
